bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Selects the TRACE clock; Other enums: Reserved

bitenum.description: TRACECLK.FCLK is the selected TRACE source clock divided by 1
TRACECLK.FCLK is the selected TRACE source clock divided by 2
TRACECLK.FCLK is the selected TRACE source clock divided by 4

bitfield.description: Selects the PCLK clock; Other enums: Reserved

bitenum.description: PCLK.FCLK is the selected PCLK source clock divided by 2
PCLK.FCLK is the selected PCLK source clock divided by 3
PCLK.FCLK is the selected PCLK source clock divided by 4
PCLK.FCLK is the selected PCLK source clock divided by 6

bitfield.description: Selects the PCLKx2 clock; Other enums: Reserved

bitenum.description: PCLKx2.FCLK is the selected PCLK source clock divided by 1
PCLKx2.FCLK is the selected PCLK source clock divided by 2
PCLKx2.FCLK is the selected PCLK source clock divided by 3

bitfield.description: Selects the ATCLK clock; Other enums: Reserved

bitenum.description: ATCLK.FCLK is the selected ATCLK source clock divided by 1
ATCLK.FCLK is the selected ATCLK source clock divided by 2

bitfield.description: Selection of TRACECLK.FCLK source clock

bitenum.description: TRACE source clock is SYS_CLK
TRACE source clock is EMU_CORE_ALWON_CLK
TRACE source clock is EMU_PER_ALWON clock
TRACE source clock is EMU_MPU_ALWON clock

bitfield.description: Selection of ATCLK.FCLK, PCLK.FCLK and PCLKx2.FCLK source clock

bitenum.description: ATCLK, PCLK and PCLKx2 source clock is SYS_CLK
ATCLK, PCLK and PCLKx2 source clock is EMU_CORE_ALWON_CLK
ATCLK, PCLK and PCLKx2 source clock is EMU_PER_ALWON clock
ATCLK, PCLK and PCLKx2 source clock is EMU_MPU_ALWON_CLK

register.description: This register allows to enable or disable SW and HW supervised transition between ACTIVE and INACTIVE states.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Controls the clock state transition of the EMULATION clock domain.

bitenum.description: Start a software supervised sleep transition on the domain
Start a software supervised wake-up transition on the domain or maintain emulation domain active. (force wakeup has to be kept asserted to keep Emulation domain ON)
Automatic transition is enabled. Transition is supervised by the HardWare.

register.description: This register provides a status on the clock activity in the domain (depends on the selected source clock).

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Clock activity status (depends on the selected source clock)

bitenum.description: No domain clock activity
Domain clock is active

register.description: This register provides override controls over the DPLL3.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
This bit allows to enable or disable the emulation override controls

bitenum.description: The emulation override controls are disabled
The emulation override controls are enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL3 override multiplier factor (0 to 2047)
Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
DPLL3 override divider factor (0 to 127)

register.description: This register provides override controls over the PERIPHERAL DPLL.

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
This bit allows to enable or disable the emulation override controls

bitenum.description: The emulation override controls are disabled
The emulation override controls are enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL4 override multiplier factor (0 to 2047)
Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
DPLL4 override divider factor (0 to 127)
